services.subtitle: Full range of logistics services for your business development

common.paragraph1: Our company provides a full cycle of logistics services with an individual approach to each client. We guarantee transparent processes, on-time delivery and competitive prices.
common.paragraph2: An experienced team will help you choose the optimal solution for your needs and will support the cargo at all stages of transportation.

multimodal.title: Multimodal transport
multimodal.description: Combined solutions tailored to the client's task

autoTransport.title: Road transport
autoTransport.description: We organize international road transportation from China to Russia, Kazakhstan and Europe. We work with both full truckload (FTL) and less than truckload (LTL) cargo. We have our own network of verified carriers and a reliable tracking system.

railwayTransport.title: Railway transport
railwayTransport.description: Direct container trains from China to Russia and CIS countries. Ability to ship both full containers (FCL) and consolidated cargo (LCL). Operational terms and competitive rates.

multimodalTransport.title: Multimodal transport
multimodalTransport.description: Combination of sea, road and rail transport. Optimal solution for price and delivery time. We select a route based on the client's task.

projectTransport.title: Project transport
projectTransport.description: Transportation of oversized and heavy cargo. Route development, organization of special equipment and approvals. Experience in transporting equipment for construction and energy.

customs.title: Customs clearance
customs.description: Professional customs clearance of cargo with full procedure support

auto-1.title: International equipment transportation
auto-1.description: Delivery of industrial equipment from China to Kazakhstan
auto-1.details: We organized a full cycle delivery of industrial equipment from Shanghai to Almaty. Included customs clearance, insurance and cargo escort.

auto-2.title: Groupage cargo transportation
auto-2.description: Consolidation and delivery of small batches from different shippers
auto-2.details: Successfully consolidated 8 small batches from different shippers into one container. Optimized the route and reduced costs for clients.

rail-1.title: Kazakhstan–Russia container train
rail-1.description: Regular container shipments via Trans-Siberian railway
rail-1.details: Organized regular container shipments on the Shanghai-Moscow route via the Trans-Siberian Railway. Transit time: 14 days.

rail-2.title: Oversized equipment transportation
rail-2.description: Delivery of large-sized equipment for the oil and gas industry
rail-2.details: Special transportation of oversized equipment for the oil and gas industry. Developed a special route taking into account the dimensions.

multimodal-1.title: Combined delivery from China
multimodal-1.details: Organized complex multimodal transportation: by sea from Shanghai to Vladivostok, then by rail to Yekaterinburg, and by road to the final destination.

project-1.title: Construction machinery transportation
project-1.details: Special transportation of construction machinery for a major infrastructure project. Included route development, permits and escort.

container-1.title: Regular container shipments
container-1.details: Organized regular container shipments between Chinese and Russian ports. Stable schedule and competitive prices.

dangerous-1.title: Transportation of chemicals
dangerous-1.description: Safe transportation of hazardous chemical materials
dangerous-1.details: Special transportation of hazardous chemicals in compliance with all international safety standards. Included special packaging and escort.

rail-3.title: Rail transportation of cars
rail-3.description: Mass transportation of passenger cars from China
rail-3.details: Organized transportation of a batch of 50 passenger cars from China to Russia. Special car carrier wagons ensured transportation safety.

auto-3.title: Express delivery of urgent cargo
auto-3.details: Completed urgent delivery of critical equipment for an oil refinery. Transit time: 72 hours instead of the standard 7 days.

about.title: About company
about.missionDescription1: Our mission is to create reliable logistics bridges between countries and continents, providing enterprises with efficient and cost-effective solutions for international trade.
about.missionDescription2: We strive to become the leading logistics company in the region, providing the highest quality services and contributing to the development of international business of our clients.
